content: materials 9 skeins of purl soho s tulip cotton 1 100% organically grown cotton each skein is 131 yards/ 100 grams - color a 1 skein approximately 131 yards required - color b 1 skein approximately 131 yards required - color c 1 skein approximately 131 yards required - color d 6 skeins approximately 738 yards required you ll also need… - us 6 4 mm 40-inch circular needles 2 for our samples we used all use heirloom white for color d … - quince color a amber honey color b fresh peach color c yuzu yellow - valentine color a red sequoia color b pink cliff color c icy pink - clover color a pine bough color b spring leaf color c fresh honeydew gauge 17 stitches and 34 row = 4 inches in garter stitch note we used the entirety of the skeins for this blanket to avoid running out of yarn check your gauge be sparing with your tails and reuse your swatch yarn if necessary size finished dimensions 27¼ inches wide x 38 inches long originally designed by purl soho designer laura ferguson 3 and updated by gaby bush 4 1 https //www purlsoho com/tulip-cotton html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/laura-ferguson-for-purl-soho/ 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gaby-bush-for-purl-soho/
